title: Holdup Under-Ups in the X Back Style with the Patented "No-Buzz" Composite Gripper Clasps
features: Made in the USA and Imported
Super soft thick Ace bandage poly-blend Cotton 2" wide elastic straps in a airport friendly XL hidden suspender
XL wide undergarment hidden suspenders worn with shorts or pants are trademarked as Under-Ups
These Poly-Blend Cotton Ace bandage type dense elastic weave Under-Ups have the exclusive Patented smooth looking Hook and Loop length adjustment system
4 Patented no-slip gripper clasps X-back and extra long 54" length so these hidden undergarment suspenders will pass right through secure building metal detectors
USA Patented gripper clasps hold tighter the harder you pull on them and will never fly off your pants or shorts
description: HoldUp Traditional Style Under-Up Series in Tan or Black. Hidden Suspenders with 4 USA Patented Gripper Clasps. These Under-Up Suspenders are perfect for anyone who needs a hidden suspender worn with pants or shorts. These Under-Up light Suspenders have sewn X-Back style without the Leather Cross Patch For Extra Comfort. HoldUp Brand Under-up Series Suspenders are made with a Smooth Cotton Poly-Blend Soft Elastic Fabric Material. In 1 1/2" or 2" widthS. Strap Suspenders Lay Unnoticed next to your skin. These trademarked Under-Up Tan or Black Suspenders also Feature Our Patented composite plastic Gripper Clasp. Bonus: The Harder you Pull the Tighter They Will Grip to your Pants. Under-Up suspenders also have a Smooth Line Length adjuster with Hook and Loop Fastening system To Easily Adjust for Maximum Comfort and they're airport friendly with no metal parts to trigger metal detectors in secure buildings.
